Equip your crew with the right tools, from mission suits to space vehicles, manage your resources and time wisely. Develop your technology for it to help you in your future moves. You must plan your way ahead from the first turn and prove to be a great tactician - respond fast and accurately to the actions of competitors.

Beyond the Horizon uses many modern board game mechanics like territory control, worker placement and building technology tree. Play most efficiently, as you are competing with space missions from other corporations. Game consists of two game sheets - a planet sheet which all players share and a spaceship sheet where each player will manage their crew, technology and gained assets.

Become Mission Commander today and embark on an epic space journey for the unknown!

—description from the publisher
categories: Dice, Print & Play, Space Exploration, Territory Building
mechanics: Area Majority / Influence, Paper-and-Pencil, Point to Point Movement, Tech Trees / Tech Tracks

name: Ghost Gate Chronicles: Part One – The Divide
description:
In The Divide, the first of syndicated roll & write series from Invisible Temple Games, you and up to 4 players help guide souls of the departed, the dreams of the living and primordial mana through The Ghost Gates: portals between the now and the hereafter. As you fulfill your ethereal duties something new and dramatic happens: The Ghost Gates are closing!

A communal pool of 2 white dice and 1 black die is rolled and players must simultaneously choose which column on their personal board to activate (1-2 for the left column, 3-4 for the middle and 5-6 for the right one). These activations are in fact movements where you cross off a symbol from a space to draw it in a space further.

As you play The Divide, your board will get increasingly hard to travel as you try to guide specific symbols to specific areas of the map that score you endgame points.

As you cross the middle threshold of the map, your symbols must bass through Ghost Gates. Doing so gives you 1 endgame point. If, at the end of a turn, a ghost gate is completely filled on a player's board, everyone at the table must cross that gate off also.

The game ends when the third gate is crossed off and the one with the most points wins!
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Moving Multiple Units, Paper-and-Pencil, Point to Point Movement, Solo / Solitaire Game

name: La venjança de la Tia Rosa: miniexpansió La Família Hort
description:
The vengeance of Aunt Rosa is a free mini-expansion of a single card for La Família Hort. It allows to add an automa player for enriching 2-player games, or to create a solo mode. You can download it for free at the website or get it for free when buying anything else at the webshop.

—description from the publisher (translated)

La venjança de la Tia Rosa és una miniexpansió gratuïta d’una sola carta per a La Família Hort. Permet afegir un jugador autòmata que enriquix les partides de 2 jugadors o crea un mode solitari per al joc. Pots descarregar ací el reglament i la carta per a imprimir-la a casa o bé obtindre la carta gratuïtament si fas qualsevol compra a la web de Zombi Paella.

—description from the publisher

name: Psychopath: Blood & Corpses
description:
Blood & Corpses is a 17-card Mini Expansion that adds new cards to the Psychopath Killer Card Game! Simply add the new Psychopath, Camper and Situation cards to their respective decks. Instructions for using the Situation Cards are found in the 5th Camper Expansion section of the Psychopath rulebook. NOW the Psychopath has more Corpses than ever to play with!

—description from the publisher
categories: Card Game, Expansion for Base-game, Fighting, Horror
mechanics: Card Play Conflict Resolution, Hand Management, Hidden Movement, Semi-Cooperative Game

name: Scrapbook
description:
In Scrapbook, a light party game, use photos on your phone to create a collage! The closer the collage looks to the Scrapbook cards, the easier it is for the guesser to pick which Scrapbook card is represented!

Correctly guess a Scrapbook card to uncover the next one. Get 6 correct and win the game!

—description from the publisher
categories: Card Game, Humor, Party Game, Puzzle
mechanics: Communication Limits, Cooperative Game, Matching, Team-Based Game

name: NFL American Football Billionaire
description: NFL American Football Billionaire is a fast moving, high stakes American Football trading game. Purchase and create the perfect NFL team by collecting the best players with matching synergy! Hire and fire coaches, close deals with agents, be ready for the transfer window and swap players with your opposition. Negotiate sponsorship deals, avoid penalties and increase the value of your NFL team! Hold on to your best players, it's not easy being at the top!
mechanics: Negotiation, Roll / Spin and Move, Trading

name: Gobble
description:
Welcome to Gobble, the outrageously fun party card game that combines the excitement of TCG cores with the simplicity of quick, hilarious gameplay! Gather your friends, grab a drink, and get ready to unleash your cute monsters in a battle of gastronomic proportions.

In Gobble, participants engage in competitive gameplay aimed at consuming their opponents using an array of charming yet cunning monsters. As these creatures ingest adversaries, they progressively bolster their strength while employing unique traits such as inducing diarrhea, heartburn, and reflux. Our monsters redefine the concept of a 'digestive adventure,' presenting players with an innovative gaming experience.

With easy-to-learn rules and fast-paced action, Gobble is the perfect game for any social gathering, pub night, or game night with friends. Whether you're a seasoned gamer or new to the world of tabletop fun, Gobble offers endless entertainment and laughter for everyone involved.

Join the feast, outwit your opponents, and emerge victorious in the wild world of Gobble!

—description from the publisher
categories: Bluffing, Card Game, Humor, Negotiation, Party Game
mechanics: Alliances, Campaign / Battle Card Driven, Closed Drafting, Deck Construction, Drawing, Hand Management, Interrupts, Move Through Deck, Moving Multiple Units, Multi-Use Cards, Negotiation, Once-Per-Game Abilities, Player Elimination, Semi-Cooperative Game, Stacking and Balancing, Stat Check Resolution, Turn Order: Claim Action, Turn Order: Progressive, Variable Player Powers

name: Millions of Dollars
description:
Rob iconic locations and prestigious casinos, and make sure you’re getting the biggest share of the loot! Millions of Dollars is a game of bluffing, misleading and negotiation that leaves no room for randomness.
Players secretly choose roles and form temporary alliances. Any negotiation tactic is legitimate with your soon-to-be double-crossed accomplices! Those players who make it to the heist will share out the loot (or will they)!

In this second edition of the negotiation game Millions of Dollars, you will find all-new art, an increase in player count, and much streamlined rules that reduce the complexity and heighten the table-talk!

—description from the publisher
mechanics: Hidden Roles, Negotiation, Role Playing, Voting

name: Aces & Armor
description:
Take the role of a general (United States, Russia or Germany) in this complex (but easy to learn) strategy game. In addition to attack strength and armor of your troops, their tactical setup, combat experience, damage and terrain have a decisive influence on the outcome of the battle. Since each unit brings its own strengths, you must cleverly assemble your army to win the victory over your opponents.

1-4 Players
Cooperative or competitive
Solo mode
Highly complex strategy game, yet very easy and intuitive to learn the rules.
Detailed miniatures with many different unit types
High re-playability due to the variable start setup
Complex combat system that depends on type of unit, combat damage, experience, strategic formation, terrain and armor (known from highly rated game “Trench Club”)
Fast, exciting gameplay


—description from the publisher
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Hexagon Grid, Simulation, Solo / Solitaire Game

name: Battlecards: World Conflict – North African Campaign: Expansion Pack 2
description:
Contents of each Expansion Pack:

1 top card (identifies Expansion Packs 1-5)
1 bottom card (identifies each card in the pack)
20 expansion cards (Arsenal & Conflict cards balanced to enhance game play and add new capabilities)
categories: Expansion for Base-game, Wargame, World War II

description:
Contents of each Expansion Pack:

1 top card (identifies Expansion Packs 1-5)
1 bottom card (identifies each card in the pack)
20 expansion cards (Arsenal & Conflict cards balanced to enhance game play and add new capabilities)
categories: Expansion for Base-game, Wargame, World War II

description:

1 bottom card (identifies each card in the pack)

categories: Expansion for Base-game, Wargame, World War II

description:

1 bottom card (identifies each card in the pack)
20 expansion cards (Arsenal & Conflict cards balanced to enhance game play and add new capabilities)
categories: Expansion for Base-game, Wargame, World War II

name: The Glittering River: Russian Civil War Riverine Rules & Campaign System
description:
A full set of period specific rules that allow players to recreate the battles along the great rivers of the Russian Empire during the Russian Civil War. Included are a full set of battle rules, a campaign system and all the playsheets required.

—description from the publisher

name: Battlecards: World Conflict – Pacific Theatre: Expansion Pack 1
description:
Contents of each Expansion Pack:

1 top card (identifies Expansion Packs 1-5)
1 bottom card (identifies each card in the pack)
20 expansion cards (Arsenal & Conflict cards balanced to enhance game play and add new capabilities)
categories: Expansion for Base-game, Wargame, World War II

categories: Expansion for Base-game, Wargame, World War II

name: Race to Tokio
description:
Race to Tokio is an Australian wartime spin and move game where two players follow a winding track with 83 squares to reach Tokio. Each player has 3 military pieces including a tank and infantry. They advance their pieces along the board and can be delayed by mines, enemy tanks and major battles. First to Tokio is the winner.

—user summary

name: Skyhawk: Rolling Thunder, 1966 – Thunderchief
description:
Thunderchief expands the Player's ability to fight a detailed air-to-air, one-on-one Dog Fight against a Vietnamese Air Force MiG Fighter. A New Mission has been created - Close Escort MiGCAP , where you are hunting MiG Fighters and protecting the vulnerable bombers. This NEW Combat System takes the basic abstracted "MiG encounter" found in the original Skyhawk game and adds a new dimension to it. Aerial Engagements are NOW fought in Combat Rounds. During each Combat Round only the Advantaged Fighter can fire its guns or missiles at their opponent. Your Fighter can end the combat round in one of three conditions; disadvantaged, advantaged or in a neutral position to begin the next round of combat. You must be advantaged to engage in combat!

Thunderchief also expands on the generic skill levels for your pilots that is found in the Original Skyhawk Rolling Thunder game. A NEW, more immersive Character generation and "Pilot School" module has been added to the game. There are new skill levels and pilot characteristics that give each pilot in your squadron their own individual abilities and skills.

The New Combat System and Pilot School modules give both Skyhawk and the new Thunderchief Expansion Pack a whole new feel. You can now equip your Skyhawk with the Sidewinder or your Thunderchief with heat seeking Sidewinder or radar guided Sparrow air-to-air missiles, or use your guns on both aircraft for close in combat. Can you shoot down a MiG and earn a Silver Star for your victory? Find out in THUNDERCHIEF.

'Thunderchief also contains a NEW US Air Force Campaign Game that shows the USAF's involvement in the Rolling Thunder Bombing Campaign. The expansion contains a new USAF aircraft, the F-105 Thunderchief that can be flown in either the NEW fighter vs fighter role or in the traditional bomber role.

—description from the publihser

name: Risiko: Röstigraben
description: The Röstigraben is the connecting chasm of the Helvetians, bridging German-speaking Switzerland with French-speaking Switzerland. This division dates back to the 4th century BC, separating Eastern Switzerland from Western Switzerland. Today, the difference is mainly evident in language, voting behavior, social behavior, and openness to foreign influences. Risk: Röstigraben depicts the 6 Swiss major regions. These regions are further divided into partly fictional territories that must be conquered. A thrilling game for the whole family.
mechanics: Area Majority / Influence, Area Movement, Dice Rolling, Player Elimination, Set Collection

name: Feed the Chick PnP
description: Feed the chick is a competitive card game in which each player must complete 3 dessert recipes to win the game. In this game we will be using ingredients cards to complete our recipes or sabotage cards to prevent others from winning.

name: El gran juego de las sumas
description:
Old educative boardgame to help improve students to do sum operations.

It is kind of a race, from 2 to 6 players or teams. It is played with four dices. All players throw them and the one with the highest sum starts playing.

During the game a player will throw all four dices and remain with three of them. He or She will then calculate the "four" possible scores (the title refers to that) and use it to advance on the board.

name: El gran juego de las restas
description:
Old educative boardgame to help improve students to do subtraction operations.

It is kind of a race, from 2 to 6 players or teams. It is played with four dices. All players throw them and the one with the highest sum starts playing.

During the game a player will throw all four dices and remain with three of them. He or She will then calculate the "four" possible scores (the title refers to that) and use it to advance on the board.

name: El gran juego de las divisiones
description:
Old boardgame by Distein meant to help improving students their divisions skills.

It is kind of a race, from 2 to 6 players or teams. It is played with four dices. All players throw them and the one with the highest sum starts playing.

During the game a player will throw all four dices and remain with three of them. He or She will then calculate the "four" possible scores (the title refers to that) and use it to advance on the board.

name: El gran juego de las multiplicaciones
description:
Old boardgame by Distein meant to help improving students their multiplication skills.

It is kind of a race, from 2 to 6 players or teams. It is played with four dices. All players throw them and the one with the highest sum starts playing.

During the game a player will throw all four dices and remain with three of them. He or She will then calculate the "four" possible scores (the title refers to that) and use it to advance on the board.

name: Marvel HeroClix: X-Men X of Swords Miniatures Game
description:
Based on the critically acclaimed crossover epic X OF SWORDS, this HeroClix miniatures game features iconic X-Men characters like Wolverine, Magik and Storm as they stand together to protect the mutant nation of Krakoa from the Swordbearers of Arakko!

Engage in up to 8 exciting campaign scenarios for 2 players where the results matter from session to session, or sit down for a head-to-head single match of raw power! Each of the beautiful pre-painted figures comes ready to play with two different modes making this box incredible for both first-time miniatures players and HeroClix veterans!

Included are also five of the all-new Tarot Cards that bring a new level of strategy to HeroClix and create even more new ways to play for hundreds of different combinations! Complete with thick, double-sided map components and unique X OF SWORDS themed dice, this set contains everything 2 people need to play Heroclix.

—description from the publisher
categories: Collectible Components, Comic Book / Strip, Miniatures
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Grid Movement, Variable Player Powers

name: Hex-Ray
description:
Our Holy People of Outrageous Misfortune Memorial Hospital is said to be the worst hospital in the country. Many believe it to be cursed. You, unfortunately, are a doctor at Holy People Hospital. Due to the recent shortage of patients (and capable physicians), there have been a lot of layoffs recently. You must protect your patients from awful events, themselves, and your fellow MDs. Be the last doctor employed to win the game.

Hex-Ray is a draw-one-play-one card game set in a horrible hospital. You are all doctors, trying to be the last one to watch your patients expire, all the while wreaking havoc on your fellow doctors' patients. Heal your patients, get new ones, and inflict horrible afflictions on those around you. If you're the last doctor with patients left, you win!

Jane may have come in for a simple headache...then the x-ray machine fell on her. Brian and Larry were on the mend, until two orderlies smashed their wheelchairs into each other. Lillian has some kind of horrible growth -- what IS that thing? Oh, and don't try to save this one, he has a Do Not Resuscitate order. These are just a few things you'll find yourself saying in a game of Hex-Ray!

name: Warfighter: The Vietnam War Special Forces Card Game
description: Warfighter Vietnam recreates the skirmishes challenging for control of the terrain in the countryside and rural villages. Between the VC and NVA you have a tough fight to clear Hostiles and earn Body Count. You may face fierce resistance from opposing Hostile forces, but watch out - the terrain itself can be your worst enemy. The Core game will contain 240+ cards (Soldiers, Hostiles, Mission, Objectives, Locations, Action, Gear, and Events), with d6 and d10 dice, counter sheets as well as a tactical board and the latest version of the Warfighter Rulebook.
mechanics: Card Play Conflict Resolution, Solo / Solitaire Game

name: Verrotwood: The Old West
description:
Verrotwood: The Old West is a standalone expansion for Verrotwood that takes the folk horror into the American southwest.

Verrotwood is not required to play this standalone expansion but you can easily add to your games by combining elements from both games.


A simple yet robust D10 dice pool system that grows the more strategically you play.
A very low model count. Each cult is made up of only four models.
A flexible cult creation system that lets you make the cult you want.
A focus on kitbashing.
AI creatures and special terrain to make every game you play unique.
A fully solo mode.
A versatile campaign where your cults will battle for power to please their sleeping gods.


—description from the designer
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Line of Sight, Measurement Movement

name: Abrir en caso de fiesta
description:
Tonight we're going out. Ready to stir things up? Open this box and turn any ordinary party night into a legendary one.

Take a card from the main deck and follow its instructions. If you fulfill it, you keep it; if not, you drink and discard it.

The winner is the one with the most cards at the end of the game.

Answer compromising questions, overcome challenges, uncover suspicious behaviors, and compete face-to-face with your friends in duels while trying not to end up being the drunkest one. Watch out for the ultraviolet marker... this challenge will get people talking...

Break the ice and heat up the atmosphere with the ultimate drinking game.

—description from the designer

name: Balíkáři
description:
Family game in which you become couriers who are trying to deliver as many packages as possible. It's a game in which you try to be better than your opponents, but you have to help them if you don't want to lose valuable points.
Each round, players choose from several actions to evaluate. They evaluate the actions on their erasable city boards - they draw delivery routes with a marker between each city block, which then allow them to pick up and deliver packages. Players distribute the packages around their city, collect them at the depot, and then send them to a set of "belts" on a special transshipment board. There, all players' packages are collected and then sorted. Players must import other players' packages or they will receive penalty points.

name: Chytré kostky: Zvířata
description: Players lay out a number of cards (4-6 cards, depending on the number of players) face up on the table. One of the players rolls four dice with four symbols on them. The players' task is to take as quickly as possible from the common offer one card whose back side contains as many of the symbols rolled on the dice as possible. Players then check the backs of the cards with the symbols shown and are awarded a winning token for each matching symbol.

name: SAS: Rogue Regiment – Heavy Metal
description: This expansion for SAS Rogue Regiment introduces new rules, a new mission and an all-new event deck to your game of Stealth And Shooting. The Heavy Metal is rolling and it’s your team’s job to stop it by any means necessary. Do you dare? Will you win?
categories: Expansion for Base-game, Fighting, Wargame, World War II

name: Chytré kostky: Svět
description: Players lay out a number of cards (4-6 cards, depending on the number of players) face up on the table. One of the players rolls four dice with four symbols on them. The players' task is to take as quickly as possible from the common offer one card whose back side contains as many of the symbols rolled on the dice as possible. Players then check the backs of the cards with the symbols shown and are awarded a winning token for each matching symbol.

name: Architects of Amytis
description:
The King of Babylon wants to offer a marvelous present to his wife, Queen Amytis: The most beautiful city ever created. He asks two of the best Architects in the world to design the city, and only the very best one will be built. It's now up to you to create the best design.

Les Architectes d'Amytis ("Architects of Amytis") is a Tile placement game, containing some worker placement and even some "Tic Tac Toe" mechanisms.
During your turn, you'll have to select a tile among the available ones on the main board, and place one of your Architect Pawn on the corresponding pile.
Then, you'll place the tile on your board wherever you want (on a free spot, or covering another tile to make your city grow higher). Each tile is colored (4 colors) and represents a building (6 different types). Each building type will score directly when you place the tile. And the colors will allow you to reproduce some of the King's projects (a colored pattern inside your city) that will grant you points at the end of the game.
Furthermore, while placing your architects on the main board, if you manage to create a line, row or diagonal of 3, you'll be granted a King's favor: another type of score,triggered at the end of the game.

Buildings all have 2 types of scoring, so you can play different kind of games one after the other ;)

Which strategy will you choose to create the most marvelous city of the World? :)

—description from the publisher
mechanics: End Game Bonuses, Grid Coverage, Layering, Tile Placement, Worker Placement

name: Towards Gut Alley Board Game
description:
Towards Gut Alley is a solo board game (not to be confused by the card game of the same name). The box is small enough to fit in a largish pocket.

You are a hero trying to go through as many levels of the dungeon as you can with your the help of your companions.

The game utilizes a mancala mechanism as you and your companions must stave off hunger, traps, monsters and of course the boss! During the day the monsters are not too bad but night time provides new challenges. Complete 6 objectives for each level and the boss.

name: Dítě v domě
description:
Crying and screaming, worries and joys. In other words, you just brought home a baby. But are you together enough? Baby in the House is the perfect card game not only for parents-to-be, but especially for parents with a baby or for children with each other.
Baby in the House is a cooperative game for two players. In the role of mom and dad, you will take care of the baby, fulfill its needs, take care of the running of the household and relax.

name: Hra o manželství: Deluxe
description:
A luxury game for couples. In three categories - Tricky Questions, Challenging Lists and Impossible Drawing - partners will discover how well they know each other, reminisce about shared experiences, laugh at their own ineptitude and rejoice in hard-fought rewards.
The players' goal is to be the first to reach the finish line on the game board. Each task offers the opportunity to move 0, 1 or 2 spaces as it contains a basic and a supplementary task. For tricky questions, the challenge is to answer the basic and supplementary question, for tricky lists, the challenge is to write three things and ideally in the correct order, and for impossible drawings, the challenge is to identify what is in the picture and what the assignment sounds like. The winner of the game gets a scratch card which allows them to choose one of the rewards on the reward sheet, which their partner then has to arrange.

name: Crusaders: The Siege of Acre 1291
description:
“In Signo Hoc Vinces”
Dive into history and heroism with Crusaders – The Siege of Acre 1291, a solitaire book wargame that immerses you and lets you experience the last stand of the Knights Templar and the Crusaders in the Holy Land. Relive the courageous stand of some 15,000 Crusader soldiers, Knights Templars, Teutonic Knights, and Hospitallers as they defend Acre, the critical port city in the Holy Land, against a massive Mamluk army of some 80,000 soldiers armed with siege engines and catapults during the Ninth Crusade.
Fighting was brutal. Mamluk archers and catapults rained missiles on the walled city, infantry conducted relentless assaults against its perimeter while miners attempted to breach the defenses of the stronghold from below. From behind its ramparts, Crusaders repelled attack after attack while leading raiding parties outside of the city as the immense Mamluk army tightened the noose of the defending Crusaders.
When the dust settled, the city of Acre was overrun by the Mamluk army. Crusaders and citizens were killed as the remnants of the Crusading army fled back to Europe while the legendary Order of the Knights Templars retreated to the island of Cyprus. The Crusaders lost their last major stronghold of the Crusader Kingdom of Jerusalem, never to return. Can you hold Acre?
The "Battlegrounds" series from Art of Wargames brings iconic pre-WWI battles to life through streamlined, fast-paced book wargames. No need to mount maps and counters; all you need is an erasable marker and some dice to command your troops and relive the actions of these legendary conflicts.

—description from the designer

name: Flip It: The Game
description:
How did this idea come about?

I have always had a passion for card games. Playing endless hours of various such games made me realize how much laughter they give us and generally how much fun they are for all of us. I like the mystery and suspense that each shuffling of the cards creates.

But I still haven't come across a card game that would make me spend endless hours with my friends and at the same time discover each other's deepest secrets or their way of thinking when faced with a difficult dilemma.

That's why I decided to make a card game so dark and uncomfortable that it will give any group of friends who play it a crazy laughs, but also make them reveal their true way of thinking.

Finally, as I would like to be different from the hundreds of card games on the market I thought I would add a little touch of technology to my board game. What better to hear the question that will be asked to you simply by scanning a QR code?

So the suspense and mystery of what each player is called upon to answer will hang in the air until the question is heard.

Together we can truly discover our friends, let's start this journey.

Have you ever sat around a dinner table with your friends and discussed the weirdest things you could do? This game is made for you and is here to reveal who you really are. It's a game of the weirdest questions anyone can think of. 300 dilemmas waiting for you and your friends to answer. Flip the coin and let it decide your fate. Are you unlucky enough to have to answer yourself, or will you choose someone from the group to reveal their truth?

WHAT IS THIS GAME?

Flip It The Game is a card game that aims to make you and your friends feel as uncomfortable as possible. The questions will put you in real dilemmas that you will have to answer with complete honesty in front of your friends. There is no room for shame, only courage and truth are needed. Find out what your friends would really choose.

Flip It The Game is more than just a card game. It's an experience that will immerse you in exciting moments and twists! Using QR code technology, you can now listen to questions that will challenge you and make you think outside the box.

The rules are simple: just scan the QR code, listen to the question, and enjoy the fun that follows! With questions coming from the darkest and most humorous parts of the mind, every moment with Flip It The Game is filled with surprises and laughter!

Get ready to experience unforgettable moments of fun with your friends!

What types of questions are included in the game?
Would you rather have sex in front of your parents OR have to watch your parents have sex?
Would you rather have to announce to everyone around you whenever you
have to fart or pee your pants daily in secret?
Would you rather watch your parents have sex every day for the rest of your life or join in once to stop it?
All questions have emerged from the deepest and most twisted corners of the mind!

How do I hear the audio?
Scan the QR code found on the card using the free Flip It The Game App. You can download this app from the Google Store or the Apple App Store.

How it works?
Scanning the QR Code: Players use our free QR scanning app Flip It The Game, both for Android and iOS users, on their mobile phones to scan the QR code located on the card.

Code Recognition: The scanning app recognizes the code and triggers an action, usually by playing an audio file linked to that specific QR code.

Receiving the Question: Once scanned, the QR code plays an audio file containing a question associated with that card, allowing players to engage with the game and answer the question.

Interactive Gameplay: Players listen to the question, contemplate their answers, and continue playing the game accordingly. This interactive element adds depth and excitement to the card game experience.

Setup & Instructions
One player must download the free Flip It The Game APP from the app store or google play.
NOTE: Once the app is downloaded no WI-FI or cellurar data is needed to run it. Just scan and listen.

Place the deck of QR code cards end the coin in the center of the table.

The youngest player starts and the turn goes clockwise. The player draws a card and places it in the middle, without scanning the question to keep it hidden.

The player flips the coin, if it lands on heads they answer the question themselves, if it lands on tails then they choose someone else to answer the question. Then he scans the question with the cell phone and all players hear the question.

Now the question awaits its answer. The winner is the one who answers the post questions. If someone doesn't answer 2 times when selected they will either be out of the game or you will choose what to do with them.

—description from the designer

name: Backstories: Alone under the Ice
description:
Your brother's missing! Your only lead? A letter he sent you from the Mont-Blanc, in which he talks about his research and a Nazi treasure lost 50 years ago. Now you're on the summit of Europe to investigate. In order to find him, explore the mysteries that have lain dormant up there for so many years.

Backstories is a cooperative adventure game working the same way as a "point & click". Thanks to a clever system of perforated cards, reveal the consequences of your choices. Choose an action (perforated) card (Search, Talk, Explore, etc.), place it on the back of a location card, and have a look at the result of your choice!

Several endings are possible: your choices, YOUR adventure!

Will you be ready to face the consequences of all the choices you make?
Are you up for this adventure?
Your missing brother is counting on you!

—description from the publisher
mechanics: Cooperative Game, Move Through Deck, Narrative Choice / Paragraph, Storytelling

name: Brothers at War: 1861
description:
Brothers at War: 1861 is a quick-playing, tactical wargame exploring civil war brigade command. Units are regiments, batteries and companies of skirmishers. This is a quadrigame or set of four games, each featuring a full-size, 22x34" game map and covering battles from 1861:

Bull Run
Wilson's Creek
Carnifex Ferry
Belmont
mechanics: Campaign / Battle Card Driven, Chit-Pull System, Dice Rolling, Hexagon Grid

name: KritterForce: A Game of Strategy, Cards & Dice!
description:
Kritterforce is a simple to pick up, fast-paced, battle game of cards and dice!


Choose your team from a unique roster of characters!
Each turn, play cards to Buff your team, Debuff/Damage the enemy team or even alter the rules!
Roll your attack dice while they roll to defend!


(Think Risk meets Dice Throne with a dash of TCG)


Build Synergies & Deadly Combos!
E-Z deck-building mechanics!
Super Fun!
Easy to Learn!
Depth & Replayability!


—description from the publisher
categories: Card Game, Comic Book / Strip, Dice, Fantasy, Fighting, Humor, Math, Medieval, Party Game, Science Fiction, Zombies
mechanics: Action Drafting, Action Points, Action/Event, Card Play Conflict Resolution, Chaining, Cooperative Game, Critical Hits and Failures, Dice Rolling, Hand Management, Interrupts, Lose a Turn, Multi-Use Cards, Re-rolling and Locking, Variable Player Powers

name: Strange Bedfellows
description:
Strange Bedfellows - The Card Game of Political Dirty Tricks is a satirical foray into the tumultuous world of Presidential politics full of unexpected twists and turns.

Create your candidate, take positions on controversial issues, compete for endorsements, and get out the vote to strengthen your base and build a winning campaign. And no presidential run is complete without slinging some mud at your opponents and engaging in a war of political Dirty Tricks to take your seat in the Oval Office.

Strange Bedfellows gives players a chance to create their own political world, and like election cycles no two games are alike! Every Dirty Tricks card has multiple uses allowing the players to decide how vicious or amicable your campaigns will be. With Muckraking Journalism, Media Spin, Fake News, and Digging Dirt, immerse yourself in a game of political humor and unpredictable political campaigns while competing in a run for the White House!

Look for the KickStarter June 2024

—description from the designer
mechanics: Auction: Sealed Bid, Dice Rolling, Take That, Track Movement

name: Valiant Wars: Call to Arms
description:
Valiant Wars: Call to Arms is a standalone Valiant Wars game with all-new champions and locations. It can be played by itself and combined with Valiant Wars.



About Valiant WarsThe Kingdom of Valiance has collapsed. The Valiant Throne sits empty. Rebels, mercenaries, and tyrants have overrun the lands of this once prosperous kingdom. As one of the few remaining Lords, it is your duty to curb the chaos and establish order.

Valiant Wars is an aggressive press-your-luck deck-builder, for 2 to 5 players, where you must fight to capture lands of the once-great kingdom. Your rivals will resort to trickery and sabotage in their attempts to bring down your forces. Be warned! As you assemble larger armies and conquer more territory, you’ll be haunted by dark visions of a world in ruins; too many of these Dark Omens and withdrawal becomes necessary. Step up and claim the Valiant throne!

Valiant Wars is fast and furious, with no two games alike. How far are you willing to press the boundaries of fate?



Features
Gameplay for 2-5 players.
Players play their cards simultaneously.
Intense press-your-luck battles with lots of player interaction.
Easy to learn and fast to teach.
Can be played by itself or combined with any other Valiant Wars products.
All-new champions with new abilities and synergies to discover!
New locations that add effects to the battles.
Landsknecht mercenaries can be hired instead of soldiers, but they may change sides mid battle.
Card dividers to organize your game.


—description from the publisher
mechanics: Deck, Bag, and Pool Building, Push Your Luck

name: Gomoku Roku
description:
This is a Five-in-a-row based game, but this is different from the "Five-in-a-row" you are familiar with.
The game does not always alternate turns, and you have to look at the rows in many directions.
Place your stone, move your stone, and let's aim to line up 5 stones in a row!

—description from the publisher
mechanics: Pattern Building, Rondel, Turn Order: Time Track

name: iKnow: Česko – otázky a odpovědi
description: This game is the successor to iKNOW and Česko, otázky a odpovědi. As in iKnow, you will find 1600 questions, this time in the categories - Czech personalities, Czech creations, Czech country, miscellaneous.

name: Inkognito
description:
Inkognito is a party game for 2-5 players, in which you take two roles in turn - the role of the performer and the role of moderator. As a performer, you will guess the profession or identity of a famous celebrity. As the presenter, you will clue the other players into guessing the profession or celebrity.
Your goal is to score as many points as possible for correctly guessed professions and famous personalities.

name: Tinker, Tailor, Soldier, Sailor, Rich Man, Poor Man, Beggarman, Thief.
description:
Driven by the discovery of an ancient map carved onto a turtle shell and a thirst for exploration, the Northern tribes loaded their ships and sailed South. After months at sea, passage to the distant land is finally discovered and the tribes establish a haven. From here, each Old World tribe must explore and colonize the territories. And quickly!

Players must work with the talents of their group, a Tinker, a Tailor, Soldier, Sailor, Rich Man, Poor Man, Beggar Man….and a Thief. In a luck free game with perfect information, players use a hand management system to trek and sail across the new territory with haste, building outlier forts, strategically placing guards and employing chicanery to outwit opponents throughout the principle regions to claim the land.

The first tribe to successfully navigate the terrain and return to the starting haven is declared the ruling clan …….and the winner.
mechanics: Area Movement, Command Cards, Hand Management, Income, Modular Board, Race, Variable Set-up

name: Jídlo s.r.o.
description:
Did you know that there is only one Czech cheese in the prestigious world cheese encyclopedia, and that is Olomoucké tvarůžky? Do you know how many days it takes in our breweries for the main fermentation of lager in vertical tanks? Did you know that Jamón Ibérico de Bellota is the most expensive and highest quality ham in the world?
Thanks to this game, every gourmet can become a true connoisseur of good food and drink. You can work your way up to a gourmet who has all the gastronomic terms and concepts down pat, and even in a fancy restaurant, nothing will surprise him. Maybe just the price.

name: Fil Rouge: L'Ombre du Tigre
description:
Fil Rouge: L'Ombre du Tigre is the first entry in the narrative game series Fil Rouge from Julien and Tom Prothière.

Players work together to recreate a visual story in four chapters by using illustrated cards. Each chapter is composed of a certain number of cards, distributed among the players, except for one that is placed in the middle of the table, face up. Players can freely talk (without showing their cards to the others) and try to elaborate a coherent story by adding cards to the middle of the table. The main appeal of the game is the narrative creativity it initiate, the emotional bonds players experience when listening to each-other.

—description from the publisher (translated)

name: Trotamundos
description:
Trotamundos is an entertaining game for the whole family, in which you will control Meteorite, Supernova, Nebulite or Saturnite, and your mission is to gather as much food as possible before the game ends.

You will advance with your pets between different worlds with the result of the dice to collect food cards or modifiers, you will also be able to throw toys and activate action cards that will generate chaos among the players. The game ends when a player brings all of his pets to the goal card.

The player with the most victory points among food cards, combined with modifiers, will be the winner.

Trotamundos es un entretenido juego para toda la familia, en el cual controlarás a Meteorito, Supernova, Nebulita o Saturnito, y tu misión es reunir la mayor cantidad de comida antes que termine la partida.

Avanzarás con tus mascotas entre diferentes mundos con el resultado del dado para reunir cartas de comida o modificadores, tambien podrás, lanzar juguetes y activar cartas de acción que generarán caos entre los jugadores. La partida termina cuando un jugador lleva todas sus mascotas a la carta de meta.

El jugador con más puntos de victoria entre cartas de comida, combinadas con modificadores, sera el ganador.
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Roll / Spin and Move, Square Grid

name: SAS: Rogue Regiment – Jaeger
description:
This expansion for SAS Rogue Regiment introduces new rules, a new mission and an all-new way to play your game of Stealth And Shooting. Your friend becomes your enemy as they operate the Axis forces you are attacking. Achtung…schnell, Schnell, SCHNELL!

—description from the publisher
categories: Expansion for Base-game, Fighting, Wargame, World War II

name: Quick Pucks
description: Match the card image by sliding your pucks around in the tray and ring the bell before your opponent. Be the first player to solve 5 puzzles and slide your way to victory! Or challenge yourself in a race against the clock to complete the card patterns faster and faster each time you play. There are two levels of gameplay with Starter Cards for beginners and Tricky Cards for more experienced players.

name: Bringing Sherlock Home
description:
A game for 6 players with 7 mysteries to solve independently. Two pages present the mystery case and the back page has the solution provided on it.
Cases include:

The End of the Wealthy Playboy
The Extortion Letter
Romantic Interlude
The Lunch Room Murder
Check Double Check
The Episode of the Two Ranneys
Merril's Albi

name: The Last Looters
description:
In The Last Looters, a great battle took place. Several clans have teamed up to try to take the treasure of a dragon, unfortunately without success.
You play the role of two companions who have managed (cowardly) to hide during fights and who come to recover as many treasures as possible from gold coins, jewels or the weapons and armor of their dead comrades.
But beware, the dragon is certainly weakened by the conflict, it is nonetheless attentive to what it is taken ...

—description from the designer

Dans The Last Looters, une grande bataille a eu lieu. Plusieurs clans se sont associés pour tenter de s’emparer du trésor d’un Dragon, malheureusement sans succès.
Vous jouez le rôle de deux compagnons ayant réussi (lâchement) à se cacher lors des combats et qui viennent récupérer le plus de trésors possibles parmi les pièces d’or, les joyaux ou encore les armes et armures de leurs défunts camarades.
Mais attention, le Dragon est certes affaibli par le conflit, il n’en reste pas moins attentif à ce qu’on lui prend…

—description from the designer (French)

Designer's note: The images of the game come mainly from free sources, but unfortunately 7 images were created by AI (hoping for real illustrations soon!).
mechanics: Action/Event, Auction: Multiple Lot, Closed Drafting, Multi-Use Cards, Set Collection

name: Creatures of the Late Afternoon
description: Tour around the game board and create your very own creature bands. Hunt through flea markets to find instruments and recording equipment. Write and record heartfelt songs in multiple genres. Climb the charts and gain enough clout to save the Natural History Museum! Album cover opens into a game board! includes, game pieces, dice and 150 game cards.

name: Babylon
description:
Czech family game building the Babylon tower.
Age 8+ 2-6 players 10 minutes
The rules are easy to translate via Google.
Take turns throwing six dice to collect the resources to build all 8 levels of the tower. You can throw the dice up to 3 times.
The resources are: bamboo, brick, stone, wood, worker, bonus.
3 bonus dice automatically completes a level.
E.g., Level 1 needs 2 x stone, 1 x brick.

name: Andanzas en Brihuega
description:
We are located in the Villa de Brihuega in the 17th-18th centuries. Each player represents a 'family' that competes to obtain the greatest fame and wealth by performing various tasks during the seasons of the year.

In each round, an event occurs and each player chooses one of the different characters. (Gardener, water bearer, farmer, priest, guard, mayor,...)

On their turn, each player moves their villagers, can buy actions from a market, play them and also buy 'postcards' that represent the places in the Village.

The winner will be whoever gets, at the end of the game, the most victory points for tasks and set collection.

—description from the designer
mechanics: Action/Event, Area Movement, Market, Roles with Asymmetric Information, Set Collection

name: World-Wide Headlines: Volume Three – ShowBiz
description: The object of the game is to unscramble letters to form proper words or put words in correct order to recreate the headline. A code card is enclosed to check your answers.
categories: Movies / TV / Radio theme, Party Game, Word Game
publishers: Key Games Co., Saalfield Publishing Co.

name: Long Live Backyardia
description:
Hark! Backyardia once again beckons you, friend!

Long Live Backyardia! is an expansion to the award-nominated mancala meets trick taker, Bug Council of Backyardia.

The expansion includes the following four modules, each one offering a new quirk to spice up the base gameplay.


The Peacekeeper: Rein in the chaos of Backyardia with the Peacekeeper, a new token that prevents a certain section of the mancala from being manipulated.
Nectar: Introduce negotiation with Nectar, a resource that can be traded among the players for favors and nets end game bonus points.
Prosperity & Turmoil: Secretly affect allegiance bonuses with Wealth tokens, which can either grant positive bonus points (Prosperity) or negative penalty points (Turmoil).
Leaders: Aid your cause by recruiting Leaders, special action cards gained by collecting suit majorities among the tricks you’ve won.


These modules can be mixed and matched in any combination you desire.

We look forward to your return, friend… long live Backyardia!

—description from the designer
mechanics: Bribery, Hidden Victory Points, Mancala, Set Collection, Trick-taking, Variable Player Powers, Victory Points as a Resource

name: Modrý kód
description:
Rubava Hospital is on its feet. Doctors will have to defend their certification. There's even talk of layoffs. All doctors will have to prove their quick judgment and sharp minds! Who will prove to be the best diagnostician?

Modrý kód is a deductive party game in which you take on the role of doctors from the popular Czech TV series. Your task - to correctly diagnose five patients before your colleagues can! This is the only way to make sure that there will be room for you in the hospital.

name: Ma vie de Renard
description:
You play as foxes in search of a new home, and the way to your destination is treacherous. Avoid the hunters, their dogs and the predators. You'll need to cross tumultuous rivers, dangerous roads, snowy mountains and perilous swamps. And keep an eye on the terrifying wolf!

To win, find the best way and make strategic halts while watching your rivals' progress and managing your health gauge. Cross the map and reach the goal first to win the game.

name: Párty Alias: Pro děti
description:
Párty Alias: Pro děti is a children's version of the popular game Party Alias, in which you find yourself in the role of visitors to the amusement park. Using describing, acting and guessing the pictures on the cards, you have to get through the park and get to the circus as soon as possible.
Describing the pictures will be varied with some fun activities like jumping or holding your nose. The game plan is dominated by the Ferris wheel, which helps to advance faster along the marked path.

name: Rodinná trefa
description: Rodinná trefa is a word game in which one player guesses and the others, as shooters, try to hit as many words as possible that fit the word. They count points for correct answers, and the player who guessed gets points as well. The words are rotated each round and players take turns as the guesser.

name: ラミーのトリック (Rummy Tricks)
description: Rummy Tricks is a rummy-like must-follow trick-taking game, in which players want to set the best combination of cards winning tricks to score at the end of the game. Each card has a combination of two different numbers, that can be from the same suit or different suits. When you play a card, you can choose which of the two numbers and/or suits will be used, but when the trick ends, players collect cards and also can choose which number they will use to create sequences or groups of the same number. But beware, lone cards are worth negative points, but you can also play cards in your opponents melds. Which is better?
mechanics: Melding and Splaying, Set Collection, Trick-taking

name: Quoi d'neuf au village ?
description:
A game of cards to complete to form funny sentences and win the game. The theme is rurality. Unlike other similar games, it can be played with the whole family (no sex jokes).

Played with 9 cards in hand, the funniest phrase wins. A blank sentence is read by a player, the other players play a card to complete the sentence, and the top card of the deck is added (the deck plays). The funniest sentence earns a point (if the deck wins, no point, a rule is added for the next card, and a new sentence is read, the deck plays).

—description from the publisher

Jeu de cartes à completer pour former des phrases drôles et remporter la partie. Le thème porte sur la ruralité. Contrairement à d'autres jeux du même tonneau, il peut être jouer en famille (pas de blague de sexe).

Se joue avec 9 cartes en main, la phrase la plus drôle l'emporte. Une phrase à trou est lue par un joueur, les autres joueurs posent une carte pour compléter, la carte du dessus de la pioche est ajoutée (la pioche joue). La phrase la plus drôle rapporte un point. (si la pioche gagne, pas de point, une règle s'ajoute pour la prochaine carte, et il lis une nouvelle phrase, la pioche joue)

—description from the publisher (French)
categories: Card Game, Humor, Political, Print & Play

name: ジャックたちと豆の木レース (Jack and the Beanstalk Race)
description:
Jack and the Beanstalk Race is a tile placement competitive game for 2 to 5 players based on the fairy tale "Jack and the Beanstalk."

Place beanstalk cards so that your starting beanstalk connects to the clouds and race to find the hidden treasures, which are worth a variable number of victory points.

The player with the most points at the end of the second round wins.

name: Disney Villains: Gemas De Poder
description:
Hidden role game where you must discover who is a Villain or a Fairy and depending on that, get the gems or avoid it. Generate your best strategy to be the winner!
Discover if you belong to good or evil with the role cards, being a Villain get the power gems with the help of the path of thorns and magic potions, but it will not be so easy since the fairies will try to avoid it.
Includes: 1 buildable castle with base, point coins, 1 start card, 49 path of thorns cards, 24 action cards, 9 role assignment cards (fairies and villains), 3 plastic gems and 1 instructions.

Juego de roles ocultos en donde deberás descubrir quien es Villano o Hada y en funsión a eso consigue las gemas o evitalo. ¡Genera tu mejor estrategía para ser el vencedor!
Descubre si perteneces al bien o al mal con las tarjetas de roles, siendo Villano consigue las gemas de poder con la ayuda del camino de espinas y pócimas mágicas, pero no será tan fácil ya que las hadas tratarán de evitarlo.
Incluye: 1 castillo armable con base, monedas de puntos, 1 carta de inicio, 49 cartas de camino de espinas, 24 cartas de acción, 9 cartas de asignación de roles (hadas y villanos), 3 gemas de plástico y 1 instructivo.

name: Angel Fury: Kickstarter Promo Pack
description: This is the Kickstarter promo pack for Angel Fury, containing three archangels, and three archdemons, with their unique cards. It also features a couple of level 3 cards.

name: 12 Suit
description:
12 Suit is a word that refers to the marks of clubs, hearts, diamonds, and spades drawn on cards such as playing cards.

How to play
1. Each player is dealt 6 instruction cards and 6 answer cards. Place the remaining cards in separate piles in the center of the table.
2. Turn over the instruction card at the top of the deck and play in turn clockwise.
3. When it's your turn, play the answer card as specified by the previous player's instruction card.
If you are able to play an answer card, continue by selecting one of the instruction cards for the next player from your hand.

If you can't answer, you will get a pass and draw one card from both decks.


4. The first player to play their hand is the winner.

name: Evil Mansion
description: An adventure game combined with a paragraph game. Full of puzzles, RPG elements, exploration, managing too small equipment, fighting for life and a plot that is followed out of curiosity rather than duty. Try to escape this nightmare as part of the campaign or play it as a regular board game outside the campaign mode.
mechanics: Action Points, Action/Event, Area Movement, Cooperative Game, Push Your Luck, Role Playing

name: Movie Maker: The Print & Play, Roll & Write Game
description:
The objective of this game is to make your Studio the most successful movie-making studio of the lot.
You have 20 years in the game to create and release the most highly rated movies, which will generate income and experience for your studio.
You will then be able to use that income and experience to improve the quality of your directors, actors, screenplays, and ultimately your movies!
Don't forget awards ceremonies, which happen every 5 years! Awards provide you with much needed rewards!

Game Boards & Rule Book may be found in the file section.
categories: Dice, Movies / TV / Radio theme, Print & Play
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Paper-and-Pencil, Solo / Solitaire Game

name: Sexpert
description:
The Sexpert game tests your knowledge of sex in a playful way. The player who knows the answer to the most questions can proudly use the title Sexpert! The questions are very varied and you may be surprised how many things you don't know yet. On the cards, you will find juicy details that will give you more interesting details from the erotic and sexual environment. The game will be both entertaining and educational. There are still a lot of preconceptions about sex. With this game you will remove all taboos!

The game contains different types of questions. Some you will answer yourself, others are for all players. Even if you blush, know that you will have a great time and learn something.

name: King of the Sea
description:
This is a historical based 2-4 player pirate game. You are a 1700's pirate attacking merchant ships moving across the Atlantic. Beware of the Navy and maybe even a sea monster that will easily destroy your vessel.

Attack merchants, each other, the navy, upgrade your ship and claim victory by having the most treasure at the end of the game. Where you will be named King of the Sea.
mechanics: Action/Event, Deck Construction, Pick-up and Deliver, Victory Points as a Resource

name: Gin Crafters: Extra Gin Cards
description:
5 Extra Gin Cards that were available with the Kickstarter campaign. These cards are not included in the regular package.

The Extra Gin Cards will include "9148" from Benizakura Distillery, a craft gin distillery located in Hokkaido, Japan.
publishers: JUGAME STUDIO (ジュゲムスタジオ)

name: Heroscape: Age of Annihilation – Battle for the Wellspring
description:
Heroscape: Battle for the Wellspring allows 2 players to take their first steps into the exciting world of the expandable Heroscape miniatures game! Inside this Battle Box are 6 new highly detailed, fully assembled unpainted miniatures which includes three dastardly pirates, a noble wizard, and two familiars. Also included are 4 new scenarios and a new terrain tile - Wellspring water. This game is compatible with previous and upcoming Heroscape releases.

Or a Premium Painted Edition
Heroscape: Battle for the Wellspring Battle Box Premium Painted Edition allows 2 players to take their first steps into the exciting world of the expandable Heroscape miniatures game! Inside this Battle Box are 6 fully assembled, premium painted miniatures which include three dastardly pirates, a noble wizard, and two familiars. Also included are 4 new scenarios and a new terrain tile - Wellspring water. This game is compatible with previous and upcoming Heroscape releases.
categories: Adventure, Dice, Fantasy, Miniatures, Science Fiction, Wargame
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Grid Movement, Hexagon Grid, Line of Sight, Modular Board, Three Dimensional Movement

name: Heroscape: The Grove at Laur's Edge
description:
Heroscape: The Grove at Laurs Edge Terrain Pack Expansion includes 3 Laur jungle trees, 6 Laur jungle underbrush pieces, and a setup guide to maximize your use of these striking new terrain features.

This set is fully compatible with all Heroscape Master Sets and Expansions!

name: TEPfaktor
description:
Welcome to TEPfaktor! A lot of tricky tasks await you, which will test not only your creativity and ingenuity, but also your knowledge and logic. Can you be the first to solve the mystery behind the clues hidden in the TEPfactor rooms?
TEPfajtor is a team party game where players apply a variety of skills. Challenges the game puts in front of players include memory tests, pantomime, drawing or finding answers to tricky questions. Join forces and be the first to solve the mystery!

name: Grand Prix
description:
The players take turns to roll and move. On some spaces events hinder or benefit the players. The first to reach space 100 wins the game.

—user summary
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Race, Roll / Spin and Move, Track Movement

name: Presse Patate
description:
As a new recruit for the Potato Management Bureau, your mission is to count potatoes. But be careful, everyone has the same task and there is only one pencil. Will you be the next potato king?

Presse Patate is a party game where one player is trying to count the potatoes as quickly as possible while other players are trying to make it as difficult as possible for him, or even take the pencil and start counting themselves.

The first person to successfully finish counting the potatoes is the winner.

name: Kingdom Death: Monster – Morgan The Savior
description:
She traveled in a land of vivid auroras, hanging in successive curtains of heavy red and voltaic blue. She drifted through them, her aura washed in strobing power until she passed into the land beyond, her destination. At the end of the aurora there was a meadow of negative darkness, she passed like a shadow, darkness on darkness until she reached the cairn of shining stones. Their light, flickering and sputtering, absorbed by the treasure within. She plucked the dream, waiting in the center. It shone as nothing for as far as she could see, punching through the shifting sheets of light like a beam of void. Clutching the dream, she was born, at the moment of extinguishing that marked the passing of the lantern year. A new lantern ignites in the settlement, an ominous violet aura glowing within.

—description from the publisher

This is a single miniature that can be used in the game, together with four cards.
categories: Adventure, Civilization, Dice, Expansion for Base-game, Fantasy, Fighting, Horror, Mature / Adult, Miniatures
mechanics: Cooperative Game, Critical Hits and Failures, Dice Rolling, Events, Grid Movement, Narrative Choice / Paragraph, Paper-and-Pencil, Role Playing, Scenario / Mission / Campaign Game, Solo / Solitaire Game, Square Grid, Storytelling

name: Tvoje tvář má známý hlas
description:
Tvoje tvář má známý hlas is a team party game inspired by the TV Nova show of the same name.

Players use drawing, explaining, singing, humming, and other activities to suggest to their teammates a performer or concepts from the world of music. The more cards a player guesses, the closer the team gets to victory. The Your Face Has a Famous Voice game also includes special transformation cards where players must guess not only the show's protagonist, but also who they are currently portraying in the photo.
mechanics: Acting, Action Timer, Drawing, Singing, Team-Based Game

name: Auto-Corso
description:
Three routes lead to the destination. The fastest is the red one, the green route is longer and more difficult and very careful drivers rock along the longest, yellow route.
The game is played with a die. Everyone moves their car forward by the number rolled. If a driver reaches exactly one intersection with his throw, his car is positioned in the direction of the arrow and he must continue driving on the new route as soon as he throws again. If a driver comes to a stop on a brown curve, his car must return to the previous O-curve on the same route. Drivers who accurately reach the first brown corner must return to the start. Intersections and curves that can be passed with one throw are ignored. The winner is whoever drives their car to the finish line first.

—user summary
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Race, Roll / Spin and Move, Track Movement

name: Two Faced
description:
The original Two Faced game. A hilarious card game of acting challenges. But this ain't charades! No hand gestures, no body movements, just a lot of silly faces.

Perfect for a party night or choose a quick game for a fun filled half hour.

name: Jeu du gloups
description: Gloups the cat wants to catch sea animals in groups of 2, 3 or 4. Turn over your cards and be the first to spot the identical animals! A game of observation and speed!

name: Spellcraft
description:
Spellcraft is a competitive team-based game, where teams of mages split into two sides, each fighting for their throne while also crafting powerful spells through elemental management (by gathering elements to craft spells from the available menu).


Each player controls a single Hero.
All players move and perform actions on the same map, whilst having their personal boards containing foraged elements, status and crafted spells.
Both teams have a 5/6/7 HP Throne they defend whilst attacking the opposing one.
Each team has 5/6/7 Life Points that are shared across the team.
A Flag is positioned at the center of the map, granting significant buffs (and potential victory) to the team that manages to capture it.
Players forage 4 available elements (Air, Fire, Water, Earth) from Rune Spawn tiles.
Players use a combination of 3 elements to craft Spells.
There are 20 possible combinations (and thus spells) in total.
Each spell has its own Spell Type.
There are 5 Spell Types: Air, Fire, Water, Earth and Neutral (no dominant element).
Crafting 2, 3 or 4 spells of the same type grants the Hero appropriate Elemental Blessings (passive perks).
This gives players an option between choosing to commit to one spell type or more flexibility.
A player can craft the same spell twice, enabling him access to Enhanced version.
This gives players an option between choosing to focus on stronger spells or more flexibility.
Players use spells to battle each other and support their teammates.


—description from the designer
mechanics: Campaign / Battle Card Driven, Grid Movement, Hexagon Grid, Line of Sight, Market, Movement Points, Multiple Maps, Set Collection, Team-Based Game, Tech Trees / Tech Tracks, Trading, Variable Set-up

name: Tritaratops
description: Work together with your fellow dinosaurs to escape from the attacking carnivorous dinosaurs! A huge volcanic eruption, a giant meteorite collision, and a plunge into an ice age that will bring about extinction... Only you who can protect Triceratops will become the ruler of this world!! The world is truly in the age of dinosaurs!!!

name: Heroscape: Sgt. Drake Alexander Promo
description:
Sgt. Drake Alexander
Drake Alexander has always been a man of principle. On Earth, he fought to defend the rights and liberties of his fellow humans from the encroaching Reich. During a fateful battle, moments before his certain death, the Valkyrie Jandar intervened. Drake’s noble heart now beats in the strange and distant land of Valhalla.

Jandar promised Drake that if he fought against the vile Utgar, he would one day be returned to his homeland. As have so many before him, Drake agreed; and though time and countless battles have since passed, Drake is no closer to seeing Jandar’s promise fulfilled. Through it all, one of his closest friends remains the Kyrie Raelin. She may appear now to have joined the enemy, but Drake knows better, and he remains at the ready to aid her however he can.

Sgt. Drake Alexander is available as a pre-order promo for Wave 1 of Heroscape in 2024. Obtainable with a purchase of Master Set, Battle Box, or both from the Renegade Webstore. Or available at participating local game stores. Sgt. Drake Alexander will be available for purchase on the Renegade webstore after the promotional period ends.
categories: Fantasy, Science Fiction, Wargame, World War II

name: Heroscape: Shiori Promo Figure
description:
Shiori
Einar is one of Valhalla’s first Valkyrie Generals. He is known above all for his stoic enforcement of discipline. His army is more coordinated than Vydar’s Soulborgs, more loyal than Jandar’s stalwart knights, and more efficient than Aquilla’s wizards.

Shiori, by contrast, is none of these things. Einar’s summons plucked her from her home in Earth’s feudal Japan when she was barely in her teens, and she has been belligerently operating outside of his maxims ever since. Now a warrior grown, Shiori has spent her time in the mystical Valhalla honing her craft, and can blend Earth-style martial arts seamlessly with magic.

Einar may not approve of Shiori’s methods, but after her success in the Marro swamp, he knows his fate and hers are intertwined. And Shiori, though she could care less about Einar himself, will not fail those friends she does hold dear in this rising age of destruction.

Shiori is available as an organized play promo, obtained from Launch Tournaments or Gen Con 2024 events! Shiori will be available for purchase on the Renegade webstore after the promotions she is associated with have passed.
categories: Expansion for Base-game, Fantasy, Miniatures, Science Fiction
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Hexagon Grid, Three Dimensional Movement

name: Melee Grande
description:
Melee Grande 2 Player Fighting Game in which players take control over a team of Luchadores and Luchadoras to pit them against the opposing team in tactically challenging matches until only one fighter remains.

Players simultaneously place cubes from their fighter's pool to define the quality of their attack this turn. The attacks are then resolved whereby each combination of cubes has its advantages as well as hard counters. Assessing your opponent's capabilities and anticipating their moves is what will give you the edge.

The game features two game modes. The duel mode is focused on mastering the battle interaction and intended as an introduction to the game, whereas the tournament mode adds more depth to the gameplay by giving choices outside of the battle more weight, like substitutions and support cards.

20 different Luchadores and 20 different support cards will make every match feel different and guarantee high replayability.

—description from the publisher

name: ananas
description:
ananas is a strategic board game mixed with the simplicity of a social game. Each player starts with a series of tiles and competes in exciting and fun challenges in order to connect their tiles to the board and win.

Named after the most common word for pineapple in over 43 languages, ananas' theme is centered around pizza, where each tile is a topping. Successfully complete as many of the challenges as you can to win the game. Losing a challenge means your topping (tile) gets flipped to its burnt side.

Challenges are divided into three categories: mild, medium, and spicy, which correspond to the size of tile placed down (ie large 3x3 tiles are spicy, 1x3,2x3 are medium, and 1x1, 1x2 are mild).

A coin is used to determine where the tile gets placed. Flip or bounce the coin as close as possible to any tiles in play. As long as your chosen tile can reach the coin, it can be connected in.

First player to place all their tiles ends the game! A points scoring system will determine the winner based on who has the most tiles placed (and not burnt).

And that's it.

—description from the designer
mechanics: Modular Board, Questions and Answers, Tile Placement

name: Axe-A-Lot-L: Worm of Destiny
description:
This promo card for Axe-A-Lot-L is a once-per-game card you can choose to shuffle into the main deck. The card text reads:

"Flip the top card of the deck. If it is an Axe-A-Little, immediately target all opponents with an Axe-A-Little. Otherwise, all players draw one card."

This shiny foil card was available as an exclusive during the game's Kickstarter campaign.

name: Toot Toot
description:
Toot Toot is a game about hoplite battles of Ancient Greece.

Players arrange their available units, assign them orders (move, attack, hold and like) and then begin the game.

Assigned orders can be changed throughout the game but it is meant to be not guaranteed. Each order mode comes with certain restrictions that limit what units can (or even have) to do.
The feature of this design: it tries to represent the influence of noise on the battlefield. Our units create volumes of noise that make communication more difficult and eventually even impossible. Even issuing orders create new levels of volume.

This means that direct orders, issued by leaders leading from the front (and risking Leader Casualty game effects), can be of relevance.

Four armies are present in the game: Athenians, Thebans, Spartans and Persians.

—description from the designer
mechanics: Area Movement, Command Cards, Dice Rolling, Grid Movement, Square Grid

name: Alicematic 畢竟世界
description:
An army of Alices from alternate dimensions defeated the Void and then fought a war over who would rebuild Wonderland. They live the carefree but disruptive lives of heroes, killing monsters for experience points and opening treasure chests in private homes and castles. The Queen of Hearts has recruited you to reorganize the population of Wonderland and divide the Alices evenly among the different territories.

In Alicematic 畢竟世界 (hikkyō sekai / In the End, The World), you take cards from a shared area to your own territories (or column), like a multiplayer game of Freecell. The player may decide whether each territory is ascending or descending with the second card placed. Cards you don't want to play or are unable to play are collected are discarded, creating a penalty at the end of the game.

Alice cards act as nuisances in the game, but they are also the only way to score points. Each Alice is unique and features a special power that may be used for one turn after the card is placed. Territories may only have one Alice, and territories with an Alice may not be added to or reorganized. The territory will score at the end of the game based on how many cards match that Alice's preference. Players must carefully choose when to add each Alice, or they may be left with territories that don't score at all when the game ends.

name: SpongeBob SquarePants: The Flying Dutchman's Treasure Hunt
description:
The wind is perfect, the tide is right. Let's hunt for treasure.

Roll the dice and move around the board, searching for treasure map clues to get to the X in the center of the board. Remember, the X marks the spot, and that's where the treasure is buried! But watch out! Your fellow scallywag crew mates may betray you and leave you shanghaied by playing cards against you. So, what are you waiting for, lads? Dig up some treasure and maybe you'll be lucky enough to win a few gold doubloons! Or will you be stuck with plastic!?

name: Treasure Island: The Long Trip
description:
A slightly asymmetric board games where 4 teams (French, Spanish, and British Navy ships as well some pirates) are trying to to travel the board to reach the treasure island and retrieve the treasure. After retrieving the treasure the team must travel back to the starting point again. If Any two teams meet at any cell on the board they can fight. Each team has 50 main soldiers and other soldiers they can collect while travelling the seas. If any team decreases beyond the 10 soldiers threshold they cannot crew a ship anymore. There are elements of sneaks and ladders, Risk, strategy and just luck.

—description from the designer

name: Erroneous!
description:
Play as Turing, du Châtelet, Ramanujan or Pythagoras in this printable braniac battle game, much like Bananagrams for math.

Each player starts with 7 random numbers or symbols in their "unproven" pile. There are no turns; anyone can move at any time.

To attack, arrange tiles from your unsolved pile into a true statement in the "proof" row, e.g. “1 = 1” or “28 / 4 = 7”. Then read the statement aloud and dump all those tiles on any other player’s unproven pile.

The first player to have no tiles in front of them wins.

—description from the publisher

name: Warm Work, Hardy!
description: A simple set rules for re-fighting the naval battles of the Napoleonic Wars with miniatures ships on a square grid.

name: Kaninchen: Kaninchenhof des Jahres
description:
This expansion adds the possibility to earn extra points at the end of the game.
This is an 8 card expansion.

name: Jokkmokk: The Winter Market – Straw Goat Promo Set
description:
An additional set of special cards for Jokkmokk: The Winter Market. This set of cards can be used in combination with the existing sets in the game.

Straw Goat card rules:
When claimed, take turns doing the following actions, starting with you and proceeding clockwise: Move one of your cards from in front of you to the middle of the table. The card must be from a set that no one has added yet. If unable to do so, instead add the top card of the deck.

Then, starting with you and going clockwise, each player chooses and gains a card from the middle of the table.

Reminder: Any cards gained do not activate their effects.

The cards in this set score the points in the top left corner as all cards do. No special scoring.
mechanics: Set Collection, Tile Placement, Turn Order: Time Track, Variable Phase Order, Variable Set-up

name: Vesuvius (fan expansion for Age of Steam)
description:
Age of Steam - Vesuvius is a free print-and-play expansion for Age of Steam, designed for 2 or 3 players.

You are engineers around the years 60-80 AD, building the Roman road network around the Bay of Naples, and also assisting building the great aqueducts throughout the region to link towns and cities to the fresh water supply from the aquifers at the top of the various mountain ranges. Manage your Denarii effectively to impress the emperor.

But beware: At some point during the game, Vesuvius may erupt, destroying some of the nearby roads and cities!

Normal Age of Steam rules apply, with the following main changes:

Blue cubes represent Water from Aquifers, and can be delivered anywhere (except other aquifers), but reward money, not income.
Turn Order Pass is replaced by Aquarius' Bonus, which allows a 3rd delivery, which must be water.
Vesuvius erupts if it ever runs out of water on the hex, "destroying" a number of tiles in the wind's direction.


—description from the designer
categories: Ancient, Economic, Expansion for Base-game, Fan Expansion, Print & Play, Trains, Transportation
mechanics: Network and Route Building, Pick-up and Deliver, Tile Placement, Turn Order: Auction

name: Keep it PNW
description:
Full of rain, radical politics, cultural diversity, & questionable streetwear, Keep it PNW is your guide to the upper left.

This card pack includes 300 prompt & answer cards based on Pacific Northwest experiences & culture. Each round, the designated judge reads a prompt card, & the remaining players choose the best answer card to fit the prompt. The winner of the round, as chosen by the judge, receives a point. Whoever reaches 10 points first wins.

May the best hippie win.

—description from the designer
categories: Card Game, Humor, Mature / Adult, Party Game
mechanics: Hand Management, Player Judge, Simultaneous Action Selection

name: Down the Ave
description:
A card game for Seattleites, by Seattleites.

Want to put your Seattle experiences to the test? College in this city comes with some special memories. Challenge your friends to an unfiltered card game and remember those sweet, sweet campus days.

Enjoy game night with the same great, authentic Seattle college experiences, but with a post-grad perspective. Down the Ave cards are based on student life in Seattle’s U District.

Each deck comes with a pack of 255 Purple Answer Cards and 45 White Question Cards. 3 Question Cards are gold foiled and are worth double the points. Included in every pack, is also a Rule Sheet with instructions on how to play Down the Ave, along with terms that give more detail about the Seattle experience.

—description from the publisher
categories: Card Game, Humor, Mature / Adult, Party Game
mechanics: Hand Management, Player Judge, Simultaneous Action Selection

name: Rondino
description:
On a wooden board 48 holes form a circle. Depending on the number of players, a starting position is chosen with colored sticks in the holes. Each player has 4 sticks in each of his 2 colors. On your turn, move one of your sticks to an adjacent empty hole or jump over one stick (no restriction) or several adjacent sticks (but not of the same color as the jumping stick). The player who exchanges all of his sticks of one color with the sticks of the other color wins.
The game comes with a small box containing the sticks and separately the board and the rules.

name: CATAN: The Helpers – Leader of the Flock
description:
New character card to be added to the Helper expansion.
Jasmin is helper number 13. During set up, add the card to the deck of helpers, and prepare the deck the usual way.
